name: Enke Token
description: A token with a picture of a person with the words "Enke" imprinted on it. You feel that this has a strange connection to some items.

name: CritMedic Token
description: A token with a picture of a person with the words "CritMedic" imprinted on it. On the opposite side it says "Spiky Chitin Sword".

name: Slax Token
description: A token with a picture of a person with the words "Slax" imprinted on it. On the opposite side it says "Bone Dagger; Spike Bat; Blade Bat".
